instructions.title: International English Language Exam
instructions.welcome: Welcome to the Language Proficiency Validation Exam
instructions.description: Below, you will find a set of 20 multiple-choice questions designed to assess your knowledge in reading comprehension, grammar, vocabulary, and overall language usage.
instructions.virtualMode: This exam is conducted entirely online and is limited to one attempt per participant.
instructions.passingScore: To pass, you must correctly answer at least 13 out of 20 questions (minimum score: 65%).
instructions.timeLimit: There is no time limit, but it is strongly recommended to complete the exam within 45 minutes.
instructions.noTranslators: The use of translation tools, external assistance, or third-party support is strictly prohibited.
instructions.noRefresh: Do not close or refresh the page once the exam has started.
instructions.systemRecording: The system may record your email address, submission time, and number of attempts (only one attempt is allowed).
instructions.fraudDetection: Any indication of fraudulent behavior will result in the immediate invalidation of the exam.
instructions.stableConnection: Ensure a stable internet connection throughout the exam.
instructions.quietPlace: Choose a quiet and distraction-free environment.
instructions.readCarefully: Read each question carefully before answering.
instructions.oneAnswer: Select only one answer per question.
instructions.clickSubmit: Upon completion, click the "Submit" button to register your responses.
instructions.languageNote: All questions are in English. Instructions are displayed in both languages for your convenience.
